Articles.Content:
The download link is back up, but the mod may be obsolete. This mod adds many planets to the Kerbin system for Planet Factory CE, including a kerbin-like planet.

Pictures

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Downloads

The Planet Pack

Link To Planetfactory CE

Edited October 11, 2014 by JTG
Project re-un-abandoned!

You can show your album directly by [ imgur ]58aAY[ /imgur ]

Just remove the spaces

You can show your album directly by [ imgur ]58aAY[ /imgur ]

Just remove the spaces

Oh, thanks for the tip.
I like The Fragments Orbiting Fraggum.
What version cloud pack were you using when creating your clouds? Just wondering if I should install the older version or the new version with this pack.

It looks like there is a problem with the Black Hole.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-05-0207-25-36-73.jpg

I found the problem.

Rename the two png images UNKNOWN_map_ to UNKNOWN_map and UNKNOWN_normal_ to UNKNOWN_normal

Great job on these planets so far! Librar is very cool, and the fragments around Fraggum, nicely done.

Edited May 2, 2014 by Larrt_M

I haven't checked the mod yet, but do we need to install Visual Enhancements to have fragments? They look a bit bad, but still its awesome that you added them!

Maybe you can add a blackish atmosphere to Loopin and add some red lakes to simulate lava (Not sure how hard it is to add an ocean though)

It looks like there is a problem with the Black Hole.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-05-0207-25-36-73.jpg

I found the problem.

Rename the two png images UNKNOWN_map_ to UNKNOWN_map and UNKNOWN_normal_ to UNKNOWN_normal

Great job on these planets so far! Librar is very cool, and the fragments around Fraggum, nicely done.

I'll fix the filenames real quick.

I haven't checked the mod yet, but do we need to install Visual Enhancements to have fragments? They look a bit bad, but still its awesome that you added them!

Maybe you can add a blackish atmosphere to Loopin and add some red lakes to simulate lava (Not sure how hard it is to add an ocean though)

Visual Enhancements IS required just for the fragments and maybe clouds over other planets, but you don't need it if you prefer fraggum without the bits flying over it.

Also, I tried adding atmospheres and lakes to loopin, but I found that you can only add atmospheres and lakes to planets that have them, such as Laythe and Eve. I may be wrong, I'll try out more stuff later.
Great looking planets you made! The lava one looks rela tempting hehe, have you tried the terraforming wip mod? With that you can almost make planets from scratch, cheers
I will give Lakia a go tomorrow. The textures look really great! But no clouds? Can you not copy the clouds on Laythe?

Wow, I'm having a hard time keeping up with the new versions.

You should consider adding version numbers to your system downloads, it's getting a bit confusing figuring out if I have the latest update.

Just finished looking over all your planets, very nicely done. Great variety! Lakia looks real good with the clouds. They all look cool! I like the UNKNOWN planet also. I need to send a ship there to see what happens... Keep up the great work.

Looking forward to more of your creations!!

Edited May 5, 2014 by Larrt_M
Nice Use Of PQSOblate For Glume.

Just did a landing on Lakia. Very cool!

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-05-0710-26-52-90.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-05-0710-58-21-30.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-05-0711-01-59-19.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-05-0711-08-57-57.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-05-0711-15-02-69.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-05-0711-29-10-43.jpg

I got a ton of great pictures and I haven't even explored with the rover yet!

Edited May 7, 2014 by Larrt_M
Nice Job On Lakia I failed On Making Earth Like Planets.

Nice Job On Lakia I failed On Making Earth Like Planets.

CZF30 is pretty good!

- - - Updated - - -

I gave Lakia some rings. So cool looking...
Bring the download back

Bring the download back

Brought back the DL link, and started thinking up more planets to make.

Something like this might be coming up.
I'm bringing back PlanetFactory with Kopernicus, would you like to contribute?
